title: Strategies to Enhance the Effectiveness of Computer-Based Language Learning Modules

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: A language education program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment, where sustaining learner engagement and motivation is the core challenge

learning_goals: Learners consistently complete learning modules three or more times per week in a mobile-based microlearning environment.
Learners achieve a 20% or higher improvement in language proficiency assessments after applying computer-based learning strategies.
Learners enhance their self-regulated learning ability and recognition of learning value by at least Level 2 on a 3-level scale during the learning process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
